newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Micron Electronics EPS.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Micron Electronics EPS.

text.p: -- Rodman & Renshaw said it raised its earnings estimates on Micron Electronics Inc for the next two fiscal years, following Micron's release of fiscal first quarter earnings of $0.27 per share, well above Rodman's $0.18 estimate.
-- Raised FY 1997 estimate to $1.22 per share from $0.96.
-- Raised FY 1998 estimate to $1.72 per share from $1.60.
-- Set 12-month target price at $27 per share, based on 20 times calendar 1997 estimate of $1.34 per share.
